segments.text: So , who do you work for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I work for a large multinational company called DAK Group . We have five main area of business - construction , heavy industry , shipbuilding , motor vehicles and telecommunications .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And which side of the business do you work in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The motor vehicles division . I work in our Belgian factory . We manufacture components for our car production plants in Europe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In Seoul . But the company has operations in over fifty countries and thirty factories all over the world .
segments.speaker: S2
